member.name: T:FontAwesome6.Fonts.Awesome
member.summary: Provides attached properties to set FontAwesome icons on controls.

member.name: F:FontAwesome6.Fonts.Awesome.IconProperty
member.summary: Identifies the FontAwesome6.Fonts.Awesome.Icon attached dependency property.

member.name: M:FontAwesome6.Fonts.Awesome.GetIcon(System.Windows.DependencyObject)
member.summary: Gets the icon of a ContentControl, expressed as a FontAwesome icon.
member.param: The ContentControl subject of the query

member.name: M:FontAwesome6.Fonts.Awesome.SetIcon(System.Windows.DependencyObject,FontAwesome6.EFontAwesomeIcon)
member.summary: Sets the icon of a ContentControl expressed as a FontAwesome icon. This will cause the content to be redrawn.
member.param: The ContentControl where to set the icon
FontAwesome icon to set as icon

member.name: T:FontAwesome6.Fonts.Converters.ImageSourceConverter
member.summary: Converts a FontAwesomIcon to an ImageSource. Use the ConverterParameter to pass the Brush.

member.summary: EFontAwesomeIcon extensions
EFontAwesomeIcon extensions

member.name: M:FontAwesome6.Fonts.Extensions.EFontAwesomeIconExtensions.GetFontFamily(FontAwesome6.EFontAwesomeIcon)
member.summary: Get the FontFamily of an icon

member.name: M:FontAwesome6.Fonts.Extensions.EFontAwesomeIconExtensions.GetTypeFace(FontAwesome6.EFontAwesomeIcon)
member.summary: Get the Typeface of EFontAwesomeStyle

member.name: M:FontAwesome6.Fonts.Extensions.EFontAwesomeIconExtensions.CreateImageSource(FontAwesome6.EFontAwesomeIcon,System.Windows.Media.Brush,System.Windows.Media.Brush,System.Nullable{System.Boolean},System.Nullable{System.Double},System.Nullable{System.Double},System.Double)
member.summary: Creates a new System.Windows.Media.ImageSource of a specified FontAwesomeIcon and foreground System.Windows.Media.Brush.
member.param: The FontAwesome icon to be drawn.
The System.Windows.Media.Brush to be used as the primary color.
The System.Windows.Media.Brush to be used as the secondary color.
The boolean to be used for swapping the opacity between primary and secondary colors.
The double? as the primary opacity.
The double? as the secondary opacity.
The font size in em.

member.name: M:FontAwesome6.Fonts.Extensions.EFontAwesomeIconExtensions.CreateDrawing(FontAwesome6.EFontAwesomeIcon,System.Windows.Media.Brush,System.Windows.Media.Brush,System.Nullable{System.Boolean},System.Nullable{System.Double},System.Nullable{System.Double},System.Double)
member.summary: Creates a new System.Windows.Media.Drawing of a specified FontAwesomeIcon and foreground System.Windows.Media.Brush. This will use the Font for the Drawing creation.
member.param: The FontAwesome icon to be drawn.
The System.Windows.Media.Brush to be used as the primary color.
The System.Windows.Media.Brush to be used as the secondary color.
The boolean to be used for swapping the opacity between primary and secondary colors.
The double? as the primary opacity.
The double? as the secondary opacity.
The font size in em.

member.name: M:FontAwesome6.Fonts.Extensions.EFontAwesomeIconExtensions.CreateFormattedText(System.String,System.Windows.Media.Typeface,System.Windows.Media.Brush,System.Double)
member.summary: Creates a new System.Windows.Media.FormattedText of a specified FontAwesomeIcon and foreground System.Windows.Media.Brush.
member.param: The FontAwesome icon to be drawn.
The System.Windows.Media.Brush to be used as the foreground.
The font size in em.

member.name: M:FontAwesome6.Fonts.Extensions.EFontAwesomeIconExtensions.CreateFormattedText(FontAwesome6.EFontAwesomeIcon,System.Windows.Media.Brush,System.Double)
member.summary: Creates a new System.Windows.Media.FormattedText of a specified FontAwesomeIcon and foreground System.Windows.Media.Brush.
member.param: The FontAwesome icon to be drawn.
The System.Windows.Media.Brush to be used as the foreground.
The font size in em.

member.name: P:FontAwesome6.Fonts.FontAwesome.Icon
member.summary: Gets or sets the FontAwesome icon. Changing this property will cause the icon to be redrawn.

member.name: P:FontAwesome6.Fonts.FontAwesome.Spin
member.summary: Gets or sets the current spin (angle) animation of the icon.

member.name: P:FontAwesome6.Fonts.FontAwesome.SpinDuration
member.summary: Gets or sets the duration of the spinning animation (in seconds). This will stop and start the spin animation.

member.name: P:FontAwesome6.Fonts.FontAwesome.Pulse
member.summary: Gets or sets the current pulse animation of the icon.

member.name: P:FontAwesome6.Fonts.FontAwesome.PulseDuration
member.summary: Gets or sets the duration of the pulse animation (in seconds). This will stop and start the pulse animation.

member.name: P:FontAwesome6.Fonts.FontAwesome.Rotation
member.summary: Gets or sets the current rotation (angle).

member.name: P:FontAwesome6.Fonts.FontAwesome.FlipOrientation
member.summary: Gets or sets the current orientation (horizontal, vertical).

member.name: T:FontAwesome6.Fonts.FontAwesomeFonts
member.summary: Provides FontFamilies and TypeFaces of FontAwesome6.

member.name: M:FontAwesome6.Fonts.FontAwesomeFonts.LoadStyles(System.Uri,FontAwesome6.EFontAwesomeStyle[])
member.summary: Loads the FontFamily and Typeface for the specific EFontAwesomeStyles.
member.param: Uri to the location of the font file. Load from resources: new Uri("pack://application:,,,/FontAwesome6.Net;component/Fonts/") Load from a directory: new Uri("file:///C:/Temp/", UriKind.Absolute)
The EFontAwesomeStyles which should be loaded.

member.name: M:FontAwesome6.Fonts.FontAwesomeFonts.LoadStyles(System.String,FontAwesome6.EFontAwesomeStyle[])
member.summary: Loads the FontFamily and Typeface for the specific EFontAwesomeStyles.
member.param: Path to the location of the font file.
The EFontAwesomeStyle which should be loaded.

member.name: M:FontAwesome6.Fonts.FontAwesomeFonts.LoadAllStyles(System.Uri)
member.summary: Loads all FontFamilies and Typefaces for all EFontAwesomeStyles.
member.param: Uri to the location of all font files. Load from resources: new Uri("pack://application:,,,/FontAwesome6.Net;component/Fonts/") Load from a directory: new Uri("file:///C:/Temp/", UriKind.Absolute)

member.name: M:FontAwesome6.Fonts.FontAwesomeFonts.LoadAllStyles(System.String)
member.summary: Loads all FontFamilies and Typefaces.
member.param: Path to the location of all font files.

member.name: P:FontAwesome6.Fonts.ImageAwesome.SecondaryColor
member.summary: Gets or sets the secondary brush of the icon. Changing this property will cause the icon to be redrawn. Duotone icons only!

member.name: P:FontAwesome6.Fonts.ImageAwesome.PrimaryOpacity
member.summary: Gets or sets the primary opacity of the icon. Changing this property will cause the icon to be redrawn. Duotone icons only!

member.name: P:FontAwesome6.Fonts.ImageAwesome.SecondaryOpacity
member.summary: Gets or sets the secondary opacity of the icon. Changing this property will cause the icon to be redrawn. Duotone icons only!

member.name: P:FontAwesome6.Fonts.ImageAwesome.SwapOpacity
member.summary: Gets or sets the swap opacity setting of the icon. Changing this property will cause the icon to be redrawn. Duotone icons only!
